description:
The Raging Serpent Mushuf’shu suddenly appears in front of Fire and his friends!  Mushuf’shu’s powerful moves overwhelm Fire!  But then, thanks to Kerogon’s suggestion, Fire uses the Fire Dragon Egg and summons the Red Dragon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Smelly Attack! The Raging Serpent Mushuf`shu
臭撃! 怒る蛇ムシュフシュ
